Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2014 01:15PM M0mmyof2 wrote: When I was diagnosed, I told my family and then a few close friends of ours. Everyone was so sympathetic and then after a month because I had been trying to process everything, I told friends of mine that I had known since grade school and high school that I had gotten back into contact with. At my class reunion when people I went to high school with that I didn't really hang out with or talk to, found out what I was going through they joined the band wagon of people who were supporting me.

Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2016 03:34AM M0mmyof2 wrote: I planted a Japanese Maple in honor of my dad back in '09. He died when I was very young back in '79. Every year when summer comes I plant petunias under it. Though I plan on moving Wisconsin where I was born, I plan on planting another tree for my dad, along with another one for my older sister out there
